name: Industrial Consultants
overview:
Industrial consultants & traders, a trading organization, a family company was founded by Late. Mr.Jawahar lal kapoor in 1979. Since then it is striving to cater the needs of the Industries in the field of machine tools i.e All type of workshop machinery, machine tool accessories, precision measuring instruments i.e small tools, thread plug and ring gauges.

Our Quality Assurance: We are a quality oriented organization and our motto is to provide our valuable clients high quality product range of Machine Tools, Workshop Machinery, Thread Gauges, Precision Measuring Instruments and Machine Tools & Accessories.

Why Us ?: We are counted as an eminent trader and supplier of high quality Machine Tools, Workshop Machinery, Thread Gauges, Precision Measuring Instruments and Machine Tools & Accessories.

Client Satisfaction: Being customer centric firm, we believe in maximizing the highest level of contentment of our clients. We follow fair business tactics and maintain transparencies in our dealings due to which, we have mustered a vast customer base all across the globe.

Vendor Base: Our entire range of Machine Tools, Workshop Machinery, Thread Gauges, Precision Measuring Instruments and Machine Tools & Accessories is procured from some of the reliable vendors of the industry, who are well known for providing high quality products from long time.
